channel.title: Giving monsters level requirements? Monster attacks?
channel.description:
So I have dungeoneering on my server.
It's a 317, delta base.
I have six monsters currently that drop tokens, but they all work at level 1 (Removed the skill for now). ID's: 2130, 119, 49, 85, 1117, 934.
I modified their hp and respawns already.
Two questions: 1) How can i give them each different level requirements? (Which file too?) 2) How can I make them hit harder/softer? (Which file too?)

item.title: Giving monsters level requirements? Monster attacks?
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]1: You need to find what method handles Player Vs. Npc combat.

2: You have to add it in NPCHandler.[/quote]

What is it normally? Andin client.java?

Read full topic
item.source: Giving monsters level requirements? Monster attacks?

item.title: Giving monsters level requirements? Monster attacks?
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]1: Find the combat on npc method.
2: Pretty sure it’s NPCHandler.[/quote]

1- Watcha mean? Can you give me an example?
What file would it be in
2 - its not

Read full topic
